title: (Pwn2Own) NETGEAR RAX30 GetInfo Missing Authentication Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of NETGEAR RAX30 routers. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of SOAP requests. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose sensitive information, leading to further compromise.
addtionnal_details: NETGEAR has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://kb.netgear.com/000065619/Security-Advisory-for-Multiple-Vulnerabilities-on-the-RAX30-PSV-2022-0348
timeline:
2023-01-25 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-05-01 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Claroty Research - Vera Mens, Noam Moshe, Uri Katz, Sharon Brizinov
